root.name: find()
root.description: Searches for nearby Bluetooth devices sharing a serial port connection and advertising a service with a specified name. This method returns immediately and reports its results in the libraryEvent method. In the final event, EVENT_SERVICE_DISCOVER_COMPLETED, an array of Service objects containing matching services on nearby devices is returned.

parameter.label: bt
parameter.description: Bluetooth: any variable of type Bluetooth

parameter.label: name
parameter.description: String: name of the service you are looking for
